name: Ghost Mission
description:
Go behind enemy lines in a stealth-action adventure where staying out of sight is the best way to stay alive, where the line between truth and fiction is always blurry, and where nothing is ever as it seems.

Following the invasion of a secret military base by a rogue group of covert operatives, USSOCOM calls upon its most elite special forces unit to deploy their newest member. Codenamed "Geist", the young commando must infiltrate the overrun facility and eliminate its traitorous occupiers one-by-one all while stopping an impending nuclear strike. Armed with G.H.O.S.T. tech to make himself virtually invisible, Geist must use the element of surprise and whatever armaments he can find to stop the terrorists and save the world.

And remember:

Dont. Get. Caught.

Tense Stealth-Action Campaign
Sneak through a top-secret military base overrun by a mercenary army using both your wits and the ability to turn invisible with G.H.O.S.T. technology. Fight back with an assortment of 8 weapons as you push through each mission segment, free prisoners-of-war, and save valuable military intelligence from destruction.

Eccentric Boss Battles
Defeat an outlandish cast of 8 rogue special forces operatives at the end of every mission segment. Learn their pasts, discover their weaknesses and exploit them for victory.

Fight for the Truth
Recover important documents from the grips of destruction and uncover the true nature of your mission at hand.

Graded Level Performance
Stay out sight and accomplish your mission objectives in record time for top performance marks in every mission segment, with better scores unlocking bonus missions!

Virtual Reality Missions
Test your skills as a covert operative in the "Huntsmen VR" mode, a set of extra missions designed to push your stealth combat abilities to their limits in as fast as possible.

Old-School Score
Fight to an original chiptune soundtrack inspired by classics 8 and 16-bit classics of the past.
